channel.title: JavaScript on Yet another software engineer
channel.description: Recent content in JavaScript on Yet another software engineer

item.title: FeathersJS Refresh Token Implementation
item.description: FeathersJS provides authentication mechanism out of the box. But, it does not provide support for a refresh token. In this article we will see how we can implement refresh token feature to our system.

item.title: Educative.io course downloader (Discontinued)
item.description: This script will download course for you from Educative.io. It uses NodeJS, TypeScript and your login credentials.

item.title: React native file system new file is not visible in computer via USB/MTP
item.description: Newly created file is not visible in computer via USB/MTP in android device. Solution is to use MediaScanner.

item.title: React Native SMTP. Send Email in Background (Android Only)
item.description: React native SMTP is a SMTP client for react-native. It can be used to send emails in the background using the SMTP protocol. This module only supports Android.

item.title: Does Promise.all() run tasks in parallel?
item.description: Things will run concurrently in single core CPU and will run in parallel in multi core CPU. It’s main task is to wait until all the promises that are passed to it are resolved.
